channel.title: Needz Helpz Pl0xerz

item.title: Needz Helpz Pl0xerz
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Hers problem…

i found out how to do affects with cbow so it shows the arrows with glow around it here it is…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) //bows { staticAnimation(250, absX, absY, 100); //Crystal bow with arrows return 426; }

What i want to know is if someone knows the staticanimation to normal arrows so i can add in as magic bow and regular bows with regular arrows.

and do you see the part were it shows the “100” thats the location it points to, 100 is north could someone help me figureout which way it would be for north or however you bow is facing =\ <---- this one is a little confusing because the bow switchs places every time you att, so i need one that is constant.

Read full topic
